channel.title: UE5 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in UE5 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Ariadne's Thread
item.description: In my Spring and Summer internships at Brunwick’s BI (Boating Intelligence) Design Lab, I helped create a futuristic boating simulation to showcase the company’s future endeavors at CES 2025.

item.title: Brunswick - CES Interactive Simulations
item.description: In my internship and co-op at Brunwick’s BI (Boating Intelligence) Design Lab, I helped create two interactive simulations that showcase the company’s future endeavors. Both of these were made using Unreal Engine 5, and will be shown at CES 2025.

item.title: Lab Echo
item.description: In my Spring and Summer internships at Brunwick’s BI (Boating Intelligence) Design Lab, I helped create a futuristic boating simulation to showcase the company’s future endeavors at CES 2025.
